title: User authentication fails on mobile Safari
description: Users are unable to log in through Safari on iOS devices. The login button becomes unresponsive after entering credentials.

title: Dashboard loading performance issues
description: The main dashboard takes over 5 seconds to load with large datasets. Need to optimize database queries and implement caching.

title: Add export functionality to reports
description: Users need the ability to export reports in PDF and Excel formats. This should include all current filtering options.

title: Fix broken email notifications
description: Email notifications for issue assignments are not being sent. SMTP configuration appears to be correct.

title: Update API documentation
description: API documentation is outdated and missing several new endpoints introduced in v2.1. Need comprehensive update.

title: Implement dark mode toggle
description: Add dark mode support across the application with user preference persistence. Include proper contrast ratios for accessibility.

title: Database migration script fails on production
description: The v2.1 database migration script encounters foreign key constraint errors in production environment.

title: Add keyboard shortcuts for power users
description: Implement common keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+N for new issue, Ctrl+/ for search, etc.) to improve productivity.

title: Fix responsive layout on tablet devices
description: The sidebar navigation doesn't work properly on iPad and other tablet devices in portrait mode.

title: Integrate with Slack for notifications
description: Add Slack integration to send issue notifications to specific channels based on project and priority level.
